pyfea.fea.simulation¶

Simulation¶

Simulation class for defining a simulation including considered physics effects, and boundary conditions.

class pyfea.fea.simulation.Simulation(assembly, physics_effects=[])¶

Simulation class to run transient FEA of an assembly according to specified physics modules.

Physics_Effect_Base¶

Base class for defining physics effects

class pyfea.fea.simulation.Physics_Effect_Base(simulation, **kwargs)¶

A class to set interfaces between the simulation and extensions for multiphysics calculations.
